summary: This bill, the Navajo-Gallup Water Supply Project Amendments Act of 2025, amends the Northwestern New Mexico Rural Water Projects Act. It redefines terms, clarifies project authorizations, modifies funding provisions including the establishment of a Deferred Construction Fund and the amendment of settlement trust funds, and addresses the taxation of project facilities. The bill also allows for the expansion of the project service area and addresses the provision of non-project water to communities in Utah, subject to specific conditions.
